item.title: By: Cuong
item.dc:creator: Cuong
item.content:encoded:
Báº¡n Æ¡i mÃ¬nh config jetpack CDN image káº¿t há»£p vá»›i WP Rocket nhÆ° tháº¿ nÃ y Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Ãºng chÆ°a? CÃ³ gÃ¬ báº¡n hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n mÃ¬nh thÃªm hay cho lá»i khuyÃªn gÃ¬ Ä‘Æ°á»£c khÃ´ng?

Báº¡n xem qua hÃ¬nh mÃ¬nh gá»­i cÃ¡i WP Rocket mÃ¬nh cáº¥u hÃ¬nh CDN cho jetpack: https://imgur.com/a/hD9f4NP

MÃ¬nh Ä‘iá»n nhÆ° tháº¿ Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Ãºng chÆ°a? MÃ¬nh lÃ m theo hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n cá»§a báº¡n á»Ÿ ngoirungdui: https://i2.wp.com/ngoirungdui.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/11-24-2017-10-45-48-AM_zp35yt_wzumgu.png

Link bÃ i viáº¿t: https://ngoirungdui.com/100-diem-cho-gtmetrix-pingdom-va-pagespeed-insights/

NgoÃ i ra cÃ³ Ä‘oáº¡n nÃ y hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n:

2.2 KÃ¨m theo pháº£i set cookie cho máº¥y file font nÃ y, náº¿u server cháº¡y Nginx thÃ¬ set nhÆ° bÃªn dÆ°á»›i

location ~* .(?:ttf|ttc|otf|eot|woff|woff2)$ {
expires 1M;
access_log off;
add_header Pragma public;
add_header Cache-Control â€œpublicâ€;
}

MÃ¬nh vÃ o nginx thÃ¬ tháº¥y trong rocket-nginx cÃ³ 1 Ä‘oáº¡n khÃ¡ giá»‘ng hoáº·c tÆ°Æ¡ng tá»± rá»“i, mÃ¬nh cÃ³ cáº§n Ä‘iá»n thÃªm cÃ¡i báº¡n hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n vÃ o khÃ´ng? Äoáº¡n dÆ°á»›i lÃ  mÃ¬nh láº¥y trong file cnf cá»§a rocket-nginx.

###################################################################################################
# BROWSER MEDIA CACHE
#
location ~* \.(ico|gif|jpe?g|png|svg|eot|otf|woff|woff2|ttf|ogg)$ {
etag on;
expires 30d;

}

CÃ¡m Æ¡n báº¡n, mong sá»›m nháº­n Ä‘Æ°á»£c cÃ¢u tráº£ lá»i tá»« báº¡n.
